item.title: Authorities end search for suspect in kids' deaths after finding look-alike hiker
item.description: Federal authorities in Idaho say they have ended a search in the Sawtooth National Forest after determining it was case of mistaken identity

item.title: Wall Street shifts between small gains and losses in premarket; Delta soars on improved 2025 outlook
item.description: U.S. financial markets were uneven before the opening bell, even as Delta Air Lines kicked off earnings season with solid results and an improved outl...

item.title: New Mexico village rebuilds all over again after record-breaking flash flood kills 3
item.description: The mountain village of Ruidoso has returned to the grim rituals of rebuilding from flash flooding

item.title: 6 firefighters suffer minor injuries in a building fire in New Jersey
item.description: Six firefighters have suffered minor injuries in a fire that partially collapsed a three-story building in Jersey City

item.title: Man charged with beheading father says he was trying to perform a citizen's arrest
item.description: A Pennsylvania man accused of killing and beheading his father testified in his defense
